original_title: Shimmer & Shine: Playful Pets Of Zahramay Falls
overview: Boom Zahra-Pets!  Cuddle up with the adorable animals of the genie world in 8 awesome tails. Help Leah find her furever pet friend, meet Kaz'a magical Ziffilon and grab a set for an epic Pet Talent Show starring Tala, Nahal, Nazboo and more!  Includes Episodes:  Untamed Talent  Pet Bedrooms  Zany Ziffilon  Now You See Her  Dragon Pox  Bungle In The Jungle  Potion Control  Boom Zahra-Mon  Plus Bonus Paw Patrol Episode Pups and the Beanstalk
title: Shimmer & Shine: Playful Pets Of Zahramay Falls
